content.title: Go
content.description: God calls us to embody Jesus to the world around us. We want to intentionally invest in introducing spiritually curious people to the Jesus-centred life, through a movement of Jesus-centred churches.

content.header1: Victim Advocacy at The Meeting House
content.text1: We grieve with all victims and are committed to taking all allegations of sexual misconduct seriously. We encourage anyone who thinks they may have experienced sexual misconduct or abuse by a pastor, staff member, or lay leader within The Meeting House to contact Melodie Bissell confidentially via the methods available below.
